name: Rolling Cat 3D (Mustafa Mert Aladağ)
description:
A challenging Bloxorz-like 3D puzzle game prototype. 

Aim of the game is simple: Just drag your mouse and choose a direction to roll the character.  The cat needs to be in a vertical state to interact with the things or finish the level. Currently it has only 6 levels. Planning to add more in the future. Have fun!

Controls:
  • [Left Mouse Button]  = Drag your mouse and choose a direction to roll the character.
GitHub Repository:

https://github.com/mstfmrt07/RollingCat-3D

You can use or modify this project freely. For any type of questions, please contact me via LinkedIn.
